about_the_game:
Talented artist Kraven3D has returned with yet another great value mini-kit. This time he's turned his attention to a run down or abandoned playground, with a whole host of amazing GameGuru MAX-ready assets. Ideal for Post Apocalyptic, Dystopian, Modern Day or even Horror games!

Included in this pack, you'll find assets for playground equipment, including slides, carousels, seesaws, sandpits and even a basketball court- all in various states of decay - from almost new to broken. In addition, you'll find a number of props including fences, benches and multi-purpose surrounds for use around the sandpit, to create defined play areas or even add flower beds.

Most assets are providing with a number of texture variations, so you can get just the look you need.

Included in this pack, you'll find assets for playground equipment, including slides, carousels, seesaws, sandpits and even a basketball court- all in various states of decay - from almost new to broken. pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 | AMD Opteron 4274 HE, or better.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon R9 Fury, with 4 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700K | AMD 3700X, or better.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 | Radeon 5700 XT, with 8 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
